title: Ethnic Flavours in Food Made Easy
description: A manual for the cook who likes to keep things simple, yet add exotic and ethnic flavours to food. Traditional spice combinations are supplied with easy recipes as well as variations on serving ideas to expand your menus into infinite variety.Techniques and photographs are given to fully explain methods and how to use them in the modern, Western kitchen. Recipes range from basic use of Eastern, aromatic spices to the simplicity of homemade Mongolian Barbeque. The book is divided into five regional sections; the Near East, Far East, African countries, the Americas and Mexico and Europe.
author: Deni Raqueteur
